clip.quote: My very first listing was from my son who was seven years old... He goes to his Sunday school teacher and says, 'You need to use my mom because she just got her license.'
clip.why_clipworthy: This story highlights the power of personal networks and family support in real estate.
clip.suggested_hook: Discover how a seven-year-old helped his mom land her first real estate listing!
